vulnerability_findings.message: To guarantee arguments type safety it is recommended to use `abi.encodeCall` instead of `abi.encodeWithSelector`.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-ownable2step
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: contract BEP20 is Context, IBEP20, Ownable {

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: contract BEP20 is Context, IBEP20, Ownable {
vulnerability_findings.message: By demanding that the receiver of the owner permissions actively accept via a contract call of its own,  `Ownable2Step` and `Ownable2StepUpgradeable` prevent the contract ownership from accidentally being transferred  to an address that cannot handle it.

Low level call in SigRelayer2.relayBySigsGST (SigRelayer2.sol#48-57):
	-compToken.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32),sig.delegatee,sig.nonce,sig.expiry,sig.v,sig.r,sig.s)) SigRelayer2.sol#51
	-governorBravo.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(castVoteBySig(uint256,uint8,uint8,bytes32,bytes32),sig_scope_1.proposalId,sig_scope_1.support,sig_scope_1.v,sig_scope_1.r,sig_scope_1.s)) SigRelayer2.sol#55

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in SigRelayer2.relayBySigs (SigRelayer2.sol#59-68):
	-compToken.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32),sig.delegatee,sig.nonce,sig.expiry,sig.v,sig.r,sig.s)) SigRelayer2.sol#62
	-governorBravo.call(abi.encodeWithSignature(castVoteBySig(uint256,uint8,uint8,bytes32,bytes32),sig_scope_1.proposalId,sig_scope_1.support,sig_scope_1.v,sig_scope_1.r,sig_scope_1.s)) SigRelayer2.sol#66

vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop
